effect.x_y: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.x_y: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.

flavor_text.x_y: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
